game.name: Dove Days : Time Flies
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "DoveDays"에 오신 것을 환영합니다!중독성 있고 소박한 캐주얼 퍼즐 게임입니다.간단하고 쉬운 퍼즐 해결.여러 캐주얼 퍼즐 게임의 핵심 요소를 결합했어요.복잡한 조작 없이, 열면 바로 플레이할 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to "DoveDays"! This is an engaging and compact casual puzzle game. Easy to use, simple to solve puzzles. We have combined the essence elements of various casual puzzle games. Without complicated operations, just open and play. It is both a stress-reliever and a brain-energizer.
